title: The Initiation
description: Tiny Dancer is the story of Luke, a gifted and beautiful young dancer who is selected to train with a prestigious school of performing arts. Luke falls prey to a group of students who subject him to psycho-sexual torment in the guise of an 'initiation'. During their humiliations, Luke's deepest fears and insecurities are laid bare while his darkest desires surface.Tiny Dancer is a work of intense erotic fiction and may not be suitable for all readers. It is intended for mature audiences only.
author: John  Shepherd
